title: Concierge Request - Book Theater Tickets
description: A guest wants the concierge to book two tickets for a popular musical.

tasks.description: Check ticket availability and pricing for the show through the hotel's ticketing partner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds two available seats in the orchestra section.

tasks.description: Confirm with the guest that they approve the seats and the price.
Purchase the tickets and charge the amount to the guest's room folio.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tickets are purchased, and the charge is posted to the guest's bill.
